# Kaspa Python SDK

> Python SDK for interacting with the Kaspa cryptocurrency network. Includes tooling for RPC Client, wallet, and transactions. Native extension built with PyO3/Maturin from Rust bindings to rusty-kaspa.

Install: `pip install kaspa` or [build from source](https://kaspanet.github.io/kaspa-python-sdk/latest/getting-started/installation/).

```python
import asyncio
from kaspa import RpcClient, Resolver

async def main():
    client = RpcClient(resolver=Resolver(), network_id="mainnet")
    await client.connect()
    print(await client.get_server_info())

asyncio.run(main())
```

Docs are versioned (base URL requires version path like `/latest/` or `/dev/`).

## Documentation

- [API Reference](https://kaspanet.github.io/kaspa-python-sdk/latest/reference/): Full API documentation
- [Examples](https://kaspanet.github.io/kaspa-python-sdk/latest/getting-started/examples/): Code examples
- [Guides](https://kaspanet.github.io/kaspa-python-sdk/latest/guides/): Feature guides for RPC, transactions, addresses, etc.
- [Source](https://github.com/kaspanet/kaspa-python-sdk): GitHub repository

## Optional

- [kaspa.pyi](https://github.com/kaspanet/kaspa-python-sdk/blob/main/kaspa.pyi): Type stub file with detailed API signatures
